metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36430 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libass 0.15.x before 0.15.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow in decode_chars (called from decode_font and process_text) because the wrong integer data type is used for subtraction.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-36430` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libass9 - 1:0.15.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libass package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.15.0-2').
